Title.language: The Conclusion of the Watos Theotokia
The Conclusion of the Watos Theotokia

text.language: W Peno#c# I/#c# P,#c#: v/etw~li m~v~nobi m~pikocmoc: opten hwn nem nekhi/b: nai etcaouinam m~mok.
O our Lord, Jesus Christ / who carries the sin of the world / count us with Your sheep / who shall stand upon Your right.

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 116px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 58px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: -55.3436px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;

language.div: Ya Tuhan kami, Yesus Kristus / yang pikul dosa dunia / hitunglah kami bersama domba-Mu / yang akan berdiri di kanan-Mu.

text.language: ياربنا يسوع المسيح حامل خطية العالم أحسبنا مع خرافك الذين عن يمينك.
Aksani~ qen tekmahc~nou]: m~paroucia etoi n~ho]: m~peny~rencwtem qen ouc~yerter: je ]cwoun m~mwten an.
And in Your awesome / Second Coming may we never / hear with trembling, / "I do not know you."

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 116px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 58px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 60.672px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;

language.div: Dalam kedatangan-Mu kedua / yang menggentarkan itu / janganlah kami dengar dengan gemetar/ "Aku tidak mengenalmu."

text.language: عند ظهورك الثانى المخوف لانسمع برعدة إننى لست أعرفكم.
Alla marenerp~emp~sa n~cwtem: e~]c~m/ eymeh n~rasi: n~te nekmetsanah~y/f: ecws e~bol ecjw m~moc.
Rather, may we be worthy / to hear Your tender voice / which is full of joy, / proclaiming and saying,

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 91px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 45.5px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 176.672px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;

language.div: Kiranya kami layak, / mendengar suara lembut-Mu/ yang penuh sukacita, / menyatakan dan berkata

text.language: بل نكون مستحقين لسماع صوتك الحنون الممتلئ فرحاً يصرخ قائلا.
Je a~mwini haroi: n/etc~marwout n~te Paiwt: a~rik~l/ronomin m~piwnq: eym/n e~bol sa e~neh.
"Come unto Me, / O blessed of My Father, / and inherit the life / that endures forever."

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 116px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 58px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 267.672px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;

text.language: "Datanglah kepada-Ku, / hai kalian yang diberkati Bapa-Ku, / dan warisilah hidup / yang kekal selamanya."
تعالوا الىّ يامباركى أبى رثوا الحياة الدائمة إلى الأبد.
Cenai~ n~je nimarturoc: eufai qa noubacanoc: cenai~ n~je nidikeoc: eufai qa noupol/tia.
All the martyrs shall come / bearing their afflictions, / and the righteous shall come / bearing all their virtues.

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 116px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 58px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 383.672px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;

text.language: يأتى الشهداء حاملين عذاباتهم ويأتى الصديقون حاملين فضائلهم.
Fnai~ n~je Ps/ri m~V]: qen pefw~ou nem va Pefiwt: f~na] m~piouai piouai: kata nefh~b/oui e~tafaitou.
The Son of God shall also come / in His and His Father's glory / to reward everyone / according to his works.

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 116px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 58px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 499.672px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;

text.language: Juga Putra Allah akan datang / dalam kemuliaan-Nya dan Bapa-Nya / tuk membalas setiap orang / menurut perbuatannya.
يأتى إبن الله فى مجده ومجد أبيه ويجازى كل واحدٍ كأعماله التى عملها.
P,#c# pilogoc n~te Viwt: pimonogen/c n~nou]: eke~] nan n~tekhir/n/: yai eymeh n~rasi niben.
O Christ the Logos of the Father, / the only-begotten God, / grant us Your peace / which is full of every joy.

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 116px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 58px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 615.672px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;

text.language: Wahai Kristus, Sang Logos dari Bapa, / Allah yang satu-satunya, berikanlah kami damai-Mu / yang penuh sukacita.
أيها المسيح كلمة الآب الإله الوحيد أعطنا سلامك المملوء فرحاً.
Kata v~r/] e~takt/ic: n~neka~gioc n~a~poctoloc: eke~joc nan m~pour/]: je tahir/n/ ]] m~moc nwten.
As You have given / to Your holy apostles, / likewise say unto us, / "My peace I give to you."

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 116px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 58px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 731.686px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;

text.language: Seperti Kau tlah memberikannya / Pada para rasul-Mu yang kudus, / katakanlah juga pada kami, / "Damai-Ku Kuberikan padamu."
كما أعطيته لرسلك القديسين قل لنا مثلهم إنى أعطيكم سلامى.
Tahir/n/ a~nok: y/etai[itc hiten Paiwt: a~nok ],w m~moc nemwten: icjen ]nou nem sa e~neh.
"My peace which I have / taken from My Father / I leave unto you / from now and forever."

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 91px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 45.5px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 847.674px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;

language.div: "Damai-Ku yang telah / Kuterima dari Bapa-Ku / Kutinggalkan

text.language: سلامى أنا الذى أخذته من أبى أنا أتركه معكم من الآن وإلى الأبد.
